componentDescription: The foundation for building custom-styled buttons.

action.description: A ref for imperative actions. It currently only supports focusVisible() action.

focusableWhenDisabled.description: If true, allows a disabled button to receive focus.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside the Button.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside the Button. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
